table.name: ml_data_mapping_d
table.description: This table holds the data mapping of columns from the source table to destination table used during data loading for the machine learning project.

columns.name: ML_DATA_MAPPING_GID
columns.description: The GID for the Machine Learning Data Mapping detail record

columns.name: SEQUENCE
columns.description: Represents sequence number for the data mapping. Sequence Number to be generated that is a part of primary key

columns.name: ML_DATA_MAPPING_DEF_GID
columns.description: Stores the corresponding ML data mapping definition GID

columns.name: SOURCE_VALUE
columns.description: This stores the source attribute/qualifier value that needs to be copied from to the mapped target column.

columns.name: TARGET_COLUMN
columns.description: This stores the target column name to which the source data is copied into

columns.name: TARGET_COLUMN_LABEL_GID
columns.description: Used to specify a user defined label for the target column. This is used to display the target column in the features summary information in the prediction results screen

columns.name: IS_TEXT_COLUMN
columns.description: Indicates if the target column value is a text. Incase of text EML performs additional text pre-processing required for ML process
